Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Ankh-... born of Bastet-... with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a plaited beard, crossed hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder, the front of the leg section is inscribed with incised Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
Condition: fair - cracked around shoulders and knees
